          <title>
            <string language="en">Calculating the speed of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berechnung der Lichtgeschwindigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calcul de la vitesse de la lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calculando a velocidade de luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcolazione della velocità di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογισμός της ταχύτητας του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calcular la velocidad de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how the speed of light is calculated using distance and time measurements.</string>
          </description>

Lichtgeschwindigkeit mit Abstand und Zeitmessen errechnet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment la vitesse de la

temps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como a velocidade de luz é

χρόνου.</string>
          </description>
